## 🐛 Bug Description
A clear and concise description of the issue.

## 🔄 Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Observe error

## ✅ Expected Behavior
What should happen instead?

## 🖼️ Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots or videos.

- OS: [e.g. macOS, Windows]
- Browser: [e.g. Chrome 121, Safari]
